Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Beijing yiqu Technology Co.LTD. is an Internet technology company specializing in cultural creativity and brand design, program software development, and new media operations. It was established on February 25, 2021. The company has inherited experience in the Internet field, integrated today's advanced Internet models and creative concepts, and has achieved certain results in the fields of product research and development, new media and creative design. Our vision is to help customers break through bottlenecks, give customers wings, and become A company with strong influence in the field.

Beijing Yiqu Technology Co., Ltd. consists of a new media operation center, a design center, an R&D center, and a product center. It has strong design, R&D, and new media operation capabilities and can provide customers with professional brand-wide case design, system and software development , product planning, new media training and agency operations and other services. With the development of the company, it has cooperated with multiple projects and brands. Our purpose: Professionalism is the foundation, service is the guarantee, and quality is the credibility. The company has cooperated with projects covering medical, financial, poverty alleviation, charity, education and training and other industries. With its reliable service quality and good reputation, Yiqu has won the recognition of customers and won the honorary title of Langfang "Luxin Enterprise".
